architectureStyle.description: Brutal warrior fortress architecture - imposing, angular, built to intimidate and defend
keyElements: Massive dark stone walls with metal reinforcements
Angular, aggressive shapes - pointed spires and battlements
Red accent lighting from torches and energy conduits
Trophy displays - enemy weapons, skulls, banners of conquered foes
Heavy blast doors and defensive positions
Training grounds and combat arenas integrated
Qo'noS volcanic/industrial aesthetic - dark, smoky, powerful
NO soft curves, NO glass domes, NO gardens - this is a WARRIOR culture
Banners and flags with House insignias
architectureStyle.colors: Dark gray stone, gunmetal, red accent lights, bronze/copper trim, black iron
architectureStyle.materials: Volcanic stone, heavy duranium plating, iron spikes, leather banners

buildings.name: Great Hall of the High Council
buildings.description: Massive fortress where the Klingon High Council meets. Towering central spire, throne room, surrounded by warrior statues.

buildings.name: Warrior Academy
buildings.description: Training facility for young warriors. Combat arenas, weapons halls, sparring grounds. Brutal and functional.

buildings.name: House Fortress
buildings.description: Noble House stronghold. Defensive walls, family trophy room, armory, great dining hall for feasts.

buildings.name: Weapons Forge
buildings.description: Where bat'leths and disruptors are crafted. Furnaces, anvils, glowing metal, master smiths workspace.

buildings.name: Defense Command
buildings.description: Military command center. Tactical displays, communications arrays, heavily fortified.

buildings.name: Disruptor Battery
buildings.description: Planetary defense weapon emplacement. Massive disruptor cannons, targeting systems, armored bunker.

buildings.name: Shipyard Control Tower
buildings.description: Oversees construction of warships. Industrial, functional, overlooks construction bays.

buildings.name: Prison Fortress
buildings.description: Where enemies and dishonored warriors are held. Cells carved into rock, guard towers, execution grounds.

buildings.name: Hall of Warriors
buildings.description: Memorial to fallen heroes. Statues of legendary warriors, walls inscribed with battle honors.

buildings.name: Bloodwine Distillery
buildings.description: Where bloodwine is brewed. Industrial vats, storage barrels, tasting hall.

buildings.name: Targ Breeding Facility
buildings.description: Where targs are raised for food and hunting. Pens, feeding areas, processing facility.

buildings.name: Opera House
buildings.description: Klingon opera performance hall. Acoustically designed, dramatic architecture, seating for warriors.

buildings.name: Medical Facility
buildings.description: Spartan medical center. Warriors prefer to die in battle, but injuries must be treated. Functional, no comfort.

buildings.name: Intelligence Outpost
buildings.description: Klingon Intelligence headquarters. Hidden entrances, surveillance equipment, interrogation rooms.

buildings.name: Recruitment Center
buildings.description: Where young Klingons enlist for military service. Testing grounds, evaluation chambers.

buildings.name: Energy Plant
buildings.description: Power generation facility. Geothermal or fusion based, industrial, functional.

buildings.name: Communications Array
buildings.description: Subspace communication hub. Antenna towers, relay stations, heavily guarded.

buildings.name: Trading Post
buildings.description: Where merchants trade goods. Less honorable but necessary. Rough, utilitarian market.

buildings.name: Monastery of Kahless
buildings.description: Religious site dedicated to Kahless the Unforgettable. Sacred scrolls, meditation chambers, clerics.

buildings.name: Arena of Combat
buildings.description: Public combat arena for trials, entertainment, and honor duels. Tiered seating, blood-stained floor.

buildings.name: Barracks
buildings.description: Warrior housing. Spartan sleeping quarters, weapons racks, communal eating area.

buildings.name: Armory
buildings.description: Weapons storage and distribution. Racks of bat'leths, disruptors, armor. Heavily secured.

buildings.name: Garrison Fortress
buildings.description: Military base for planetary defense forces. Walls, watchtowers, troop quarters.

buildings.name: Embassy
buildings.description: Diplomatic facility - still imposing and fortress-like. Klingon diplomacy is backed by strength.
